TopicTitle: Craft Changes orbit when holding onto side with kerbal.

Articles.Content:
I did a test to see if this bug was still in the game after 2 or more years and looking forward to playing with my new cpu only to be disapointed to see this game screwing bug is still there.
Surely this is a totaly reproducable bug and i reported it years ago. Am i the only one who gets this(somehow  over 2 years and diffrent versions...) or are they really missing somthing so simple?

Yes it still exists.  In fact, Deddly just recently put it on the bug tracker (here) and he would have been careful to check if it was already reported.  No one working for Squad has been collecting reports here (in any visible way) for years; they don't seem to be a big enough company.  Did you (or someone else on the forum) post it two years ago ?  We could refer back to the earlier report, which might help, couldn't hurt.  

I don't often notice it, so I think it does not always cause a problem. If it isn't fixed yet it might be for a stubborn reason so we might be wise to learn to avoid it.
